Verify the image carousel displays 3 images
Verify the current image has source 'carousel_image_1.jpg' and is centered
Click the 'Next' button
Verify the transition to 'carousel_image_2.jpg' animates in 400ms, updating the visible image count by 1

Trigger a successful action
Verify a toast notification appears for 5 seconds at the top right (x 90%, y 20px), showing text 'Action successful!', with background color #28a745, and an opacity transition lasting 300ms
Verify the 'Remember me' checkbox is initially unchecked, visible, and has a 2px solid #ccc border when not selected
Verify when selected, its border color changes to #007bff
Verify its associated label text is 'Remember me'
Verify the 'Comments' textarea has placeholder text 'Your comments here...', an initial value of '', width 300px, height 120px, a 1px solid #ccc border, and should be vertically resizable only
Verify the unordered list of features contains 4 items, each with 8px top margin and 16px font size
Verify on hover, each list item's background color changes to #f0f0f0 within 150ms
Verify the bullet points should have a 'circle' shape
Verify the 'Settings' icon has source 'icons/settings.svg', rendered dimensions 24x24px, color fill is #666, alt text should be 'Settings cog icon', and aria-label should be 'Open Settings'
Open the date picker
Verify the selected date is '2023-10-26', the month displayed is 'October', and the year is '2023'
Verify that past dates before '2023-10-01' are disabled

Verify its scroll-top value is 500
Scroll the 'Terms and Conditions' container horizontally by 100px
Verify the scroll-left value is 100
Verify the 'Terms and Conditions' container should have a fixed height of 400px and a width of 600px
